Entry.JapaneseText: 変な夢を見たわ……大きなかがり火をたいて、 たくさんの人が踊ってるの……
Entry.EnglishText: I had a strange dream...where there were many people dancing around a large bonfire...

Entry.JapaneseText: 暗い空からは雪が舞い降りてくるけど、それは 炎の先でジュッと音をたてて溶けちゃうの。
Entry.EnglishText: Although snow fluttered down from the dark sky, it would melt with a hiss against the tips of the flames.

Entry.JapaneseText: へえ……なんか幻想的な風景ですね。
それで……その炎の周りで歌ったり、 踊ったりしてるのは……ハーフ……
Entry.EnglishText: And also...the ones who were singing and dancing around that fire...were Halfs...

Entry.JapaneseText: ハーフがあんなにたくさんいて、 幸せそうならどんなに……
Entry.EnglishText: No matter how many Halfs there were, and how happy they seemed to be...

Entry.JapaneseText: ……でも、夢よね……夢でしかないわ……
Entry.EnglishText: ...It was a dream... Nothing more than a dream...
